Note: I have kept all the entities as they all refer to some kind of material property. "linear - fused NDT units" and "angular - fused NDT units" refer to different types of copolymer structures, "higher ordered structures" refers to the arrangement of the copolymer units, and "higher OFET mobilities" refers to the charge carrier mobility in organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) which is a material property.
